participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I like to visit national parks. I am a nurse. I met my husband when I was a freshman in college. I play the violin. I am married with 5 kids.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: My major is business. I love the beach. I work part time at a pizza restaurant. I like to party.

content.text: Hey, I'm participant_2. What do you do for fun?
I like to visit national parks, play the violin, and spend time with my family.
That sounds fun! I like to go to the beach, party, and work on my business degree.
Oh, cool! I've never been to the beach, but I've heard it's really nice.
It's the best! I love swimming, sunbathing, and playing in the sand.
I can imagine! I'm sure it's very relaxing.
It is! I love going to the beach to escape the hustle and bustle of city life.
I can see why! It sounds like you have a lot of fun in your free time.
I do! I like to keep busy and try new things.
That's a great attitude! I try to do the same thing.
It's important to have fun and enjoy life.
I agree! What are you majoring in?
I'm majoring in business. I'm hoping to get a job in marketing or sales after I graduate.
That sounds like a great plan! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thank you! I'm excited to see what the future holds.
